title: What Uncle Si Did After the Drive-By Shooting at Willie's Place
description:
Uncle Si's protective instincts kicked into high gear after a man fired his gun at Willie's property with people inside the house. Willie bought a competitor's duck call, and it did NOT go well. John-David has been known to use Google to help him remember Korie's birthday. The boys talk about how they were punished as kids. Martin remembers the time he and Godwin had a VERY close call with a motorcycle. Si recalls being stalked at night by a mysterious driver. And the boys tackle how to handle lack of interest in religion and the right reasons to get engaged.
-
